titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act and the lasting impact of that Act on the State of Alaska and Alaska Native people.
A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act and the lasting impact of that Act on the State of Alaska and Alaska Native people.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Senate Committee on Indian Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes December 18, 2021, as the 50th anniversary of the passage of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.
